From our signature BBQ to crispy fried chicken and classic sides, we bring the feast so you can enjoy the moment. Inquire now about catering slideshow start stop playing Slide 1 content Slide 2 content Slide 3 content previous slide next slide Lowcountry's Best BBQ Buffet Our Menu Smoky, Saucy, and Served to Perfection Catering Get It While It's Hot All specials Specials ALL SPECIALS Skip Photo Gallery Where Southern Tradition Meets All-You-Can-Eat Perfection! about us Dukes BBQ in Charleston brings together tradition and flavor in a family-friendly atmosphere. Our all-you-can-eat buffet highlights the best of Southern barbecue, featuring classic SC mustard-based BBQ, chopped pork, fried chicken, and a variety of delicious sides like mac ‘n cheese and collard greens. Rooted in the teachings of the original Dukes of Walterboro, we take pride in our authentic recipes and signature style. Experience the genuine taste of Lowcountry cooking at its finest. our menu Reviews Start stop reviews carousel Review by - Google Andy P: five star review by Best all you can eat southern style food. Their hash and mustard sauce are legendary. Save room for banana pudding Review by - Google Daryl S: five star review by One of my favorite places to go eat. Big Buffet selection. Foods always hot, fresh and tasty. I go at least once a month. Review by - Google Clark C: five star review by Best comfort food in the area. Great variety of offerings. Limited inside seating, but worth the wait. Come hungry and leave happy! Review by - Google Meia M: five star review by A great place to go for local dining. The buffet offers options that suit a most family style dining experiences with hearty sides and deserts. Solid choice but best at high volume times Newsletter Location 331 Folly Rd Charleston, SC 29412 Hours Tue, Wed 11:00 AM - 8:00 PM Thur, Fri, Sat 11:00 AM - 9:00 PM Sun 11:00 AM - 3:00 PM Find us on...
